column4: Here's my issue.  I have linux on hd0,0 and windows on h0,2.  When linux loads it hangs after splash and windows just gives me an error about bootmgr orsomething
Can you reboot it and give us the actual windows error?
Do you have your Windows install CD?
Follow the steps in the second post
grub is also saying it is an unknown partition
Grub says the Windows partition is unknown?
it says "root (h0,2), filesystem type unknown partition type 0x7, makeactive, chainloader +1"

Hmmm...sounds like your Master Boot Record is messed up...Google for "ntldr missing xp" and you'll find several sites with suggestions...As far as the Linux side, you will probably have to reinstall grub.
